ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] This is an update of -210's mod with their approval. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1409440925
Added four new spots: - Milking - Shearing - Slaughtering - Training
Icons from https://www.flaticon.com/ Authors: Those Icons, Freepik
Pawns will select the nearest spot valid for the action they want to do. The old animal harvesting spot can be used for all but training.
